text: The Perfect Circle (Bosnian: Savršeni krug) is a 1997 Bosnian French war drama movie directed by Ademir Kenović and starring Mustafa Nadarević, Almedin Leleta, Almir Podgorica, Jasna Diklić, Dragan Marinković, Senad Bašić. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:French drama movies
title: The Perfect Circle
